            Hello!
            Welcome to my personal (work in progress) site. I am student enrolled into  Master of Science degree in Statistics and data science, specializing in Biostatistics. I use R, SAS and Python for statistical analysis and visualizations. Kindly find some of those in the portfolio tab. I am also looking to collaborate in publishable work, so do reach out!.
            
            I hold an undergraduate BS Applied Statistics degree having previously held roles in data management and analysis
